trans-unit.source: Represents a single item in an MSBuild project.
trans-unit.target: Representa um único item em um projeto MSBuild.

trans-unit.source: An element in a project can represent multiple items through the use of wildcards.
trans-unit.target: Um elemento em um projeto pode representar vários itens com o uso de curingas.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, each <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem> object does not necessarily represent an `Item` element in the project.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, cada <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem> objeto não representa necessariamente um `Item` elemento no projeto.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> object and uses the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.LoadXml%2A> method to add content to the project.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo cria um objeto <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> e usa o método <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.LoadXml%2A> para adicionar conteúdo ao projeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup>, and <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection> classes are used to add, remove, and change items in the project.
trans-unit.target: As classes <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> e <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection> são usadas para adicionar, remover e alterar itens no projeto.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Name" /> property of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" />.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Name" /> do <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem" /> from which to create the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include" /> property of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem" /> por meio do qual a propriedade <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include" /> do <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> será criada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> class based on an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> baseada em um objeto <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Name" /> property of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" />.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Name" /> do <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include" /> property of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" />.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include" /> do <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> class with the specified <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Name" /> and <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include" /> property values.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> com os valores de propriedade <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Name" /> e <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include" /> especificados.

trans-unit.source: Creates a shallow copy of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia superficial do <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" />.

trans-unit.source: A copy of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma cópia do <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <c>Condition</c> attribute value of the item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de atributo <c>Condição</c> do item.

trans-unit.source: The <c>Condition</c> attribute value of the item.
trans-unit.target: O <c>condição</c> valor do item do atributo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> to which to copy the item metadata.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> no qual copiar os metadados do item.

trans-unit.source: Copies all item metadata on this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> to the specified <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Copia todos os metadados de item nesta <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> para o <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of custom attributes that are set on this item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de atributos personalizados definidos neste item.

trans-unit.source: An integer indicating how many custom attributes are set on this item.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro que indica quantos atributos personalizados são definidos neste item.

trans-unit.source: The value returned by <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.CustomMetadataCount%2A> does include pre-defined or reserved item-spec modifiers, because they are not custom attributes.
trans-unit.target: O valor retornado por <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.CustomMetadataCount%2A> incluem predefinidos ou reservados modificadores de especificação de item, pois eles não são atributos personalizados.

trans-unit.source: Gets all user-defined or custom attribute names.
trans-unit.target: Obtém todos os nomes de atributo definidos pelo usuário ou personalizados.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> containing string names for all of the user-defined or custom attributes.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> que contém nomes de cadeia de caracteres de todos os atributos definidos pelo usuário ou personalizados.

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.CustomMetadataNames%2A> does not include the names of non-user-defined or non-custom attributes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.CustomMetadataNames%2A> não inclui os nomes dos atributos definidos pelo usuário ou não-personalizado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <c>Exclude</c> attribute value of the item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de atributo <c>Excluir</c> do item.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <c>Exclude</c> attribute value of the item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de atributo <c>Excluir</c> do item.

trans-unit.source: Gets the final specification of the item after all wildcards and properties have been evaluated.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a especificação final do item depois que todos os caracteres curinga e propriedades forem avaliados.

trans-unit.source: The final specification of the item after all wildcards and properties have been evaluated.
trans-unit.target: A especificação final do item depois que todos os caracteres curinga e propriedades foi avaliadas.

trans-unit.source: The item metadata name.
trans-unit.target: O nome de metadados do item.

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the specified item metadata after after all item and property references have been evaluated.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o valor dos metadados do item especificados depois que todas as referências do item e da propriedade foram avaliadas.

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified item metadata after after all item and property references have been evaluated.
trans-unit.target: O valor dos metadados do item especificados depois que todas as referências do item e da propriedade foram avaliadas.

trans-unit.source: The item metadata name.
trans-unit.target: O nome de metadados do item.

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the specified item metadata.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o valor dos metadados do item especificado.

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified item metadata.
trans-unit.target: O valor dos metadados do item especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> object and uses the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.LoadXml%2A> method to add content to the project.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo cria um objeto <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> e usa o método <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.LoadXml%2A> para adicionar conteúdo ao projeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup>, and <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection> classes are used to add, remove, and change items in the project.
trans-unit.target: As classes <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> e <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection> são usadas para adicionar, remover e alterar itens no projeto.

trans-unit.source: The item metadata name.
trans-unit.target: O nome de metadados do item.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the item has the specified item metadata.
trans-unit.target: Indica se o item tem os metadados do item especificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the item has the specified item metadata; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o item tiver os metadados do item especificado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <c>Include</c> attribute that created the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o atributo <c>Incluir</c> que criou o <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" />.

trans-unit.source: The <c>Include</c> attribute that created the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" />.
trans-unit.target: O <c>incluir</c> de atributo que criou o <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> object and uses the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.LoadXml%2A> method to add content to the project.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo cria um objeto <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> e usa o método <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.LoadXml%2A> para adicionar conteúdo ao projeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup>, and <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection> classes are used to add, remove, and change items in the project.
trans-unit.target: As classes <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> e <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection> são usadas para adicionar, remover e alterar itens no projeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the item was imported into the project.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o item foi importado para o projeto.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the item was imported into the project; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o item foi importado para o projeto; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of metadata set on the item
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de metadados definidos no item

trans-unit.source: An integer representing the number of metadata items.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro que representa o número de itens de metadados.

trans-unit.source: The value returned by <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.MetadataCount%2A> includes pre-defined or reserved item-spec modifiers as well as other metadata.
trans-unit.target: O valor retornado por <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.MetadataCount%2A> inclui predefinidos ou reservados modificadores de especificação de item, bem como outros metadados.

trans-unit.source: Gets the names of metadata on the item, including pre-defined or reserved item-spec modifiers.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os nomes de metadados no item, incluindo modificadores específicos do item predefinidos ou reservados.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> containing name strings of all metadata on the item.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> contendo cadeias de caracteres de nome de todos os metadados do item.

trans-unit.source: The value returned by <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.MetadataNames%2A> includes the names of all metadata, including user-defined and custom attributes.
trans-unit.target: O valor retornado por <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.MetadataNames%2A> inclui os nomes de todos os metadados, incluindo os atributos personalizados e definidas pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the item collection to which the item belongs.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome da coleção de itens ao qual o item pertence.

trans-unit.source: The name of the item collection to which the item belongs.
trans-unit.target: O nome da coleção de itens ao qual o item pertence.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> object and uses the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.LoadXml%2A> method to add content to the project.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo cria um objeto <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> e usa o método <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.LoadXml%2A> para adicionar conteúdo ao projeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup>, and <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection> classes are used to add, remove, and change items in the project.
trans-unit.target: As classes <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> e <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection> são usadas para adicionar, remover e alterar itens no projeto.

trans-unit.source: The item metadata name.
trans-unit.target: O nome de metadados do item.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified item metadata.
trans-unit.target: Remove o item os metadados do item especificado.

trans-unit.source: Assigns the specified value to the specified item metadata.
trans-unit.target: Atribui o valor especificado aos metadados do item especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> object and uses the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.LoadXml%2A> method to add content to the project.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo cria um objeto <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> e usa o método <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.LoadXml%2A> para adicionar conteúdo ao projeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup>, and <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection> classes are used to add, remove, and change items in the project.
trans-unit.target: As classes <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> e <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection> são usadas para adicionar, remover e alterar itens no projeto.

trans-unit.source: The item metadata name.
trans-unit.target: O nome de metadados do item.

trans-unit.source: The item metadata value.
trans-unit.target: O valor de metadados do item.

trans-unit.source: Assigns the specified value to the specified item metadata.
trans-unit.target: Atribui o valor especificado aos metadados do item especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> object and uses the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.LoadXml%2A> method to add content to the project.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo cria um objeto <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> e usa o método <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.LoadXml%2A> para adicionar conteúdo ao projeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup>, and <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection> classes are used to add, remove, and change items in the project.
trans-unit.target: As classes <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> e <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection> são usadas para adicionar, remover e alterar itens no projeto.

trans-unit.source: The item metadata name.
trans-unit.target: O nome de metadados do item.

trans-unit.source: The item metadata value.
trans-unit.target: O valor de metadados do item.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to treat the metadata as a literal value by escaping all [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] special characters; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para tratar os metadados como um valor literal escapando todos os caracteres especiais de [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Assigns the specified value to the specified item metadata, and optionally treats the metadata as a literal value.
trans-unit.target: Atribui o valor especificado aos metadados do item especificado e, opcionalmente, trata os metadados como um valor literal.
